column1:
"Cool tones should avoid copper colors." WELP, I have cool tone skin and I'm a coppery red ginger naturally.

I'm really wanting to go platinum again but when a stylist did it, it fried my hair something awful. (I never put more than lightener on my hair before yet she still made it spaghetti) When I did it, the toner did nothing and I just had a orangey yellow which oddly enough didn't look awful but I wanted to try richer jeweltone colors instead. Eventually I just gave up and went back to my natural hair color. My hair now is as short as yours and I want to have fun with it but I'm worried I can't because of it being auburny ginger and never bleaching right. D: Help!
